# Extract Marketing Testimonials from Feedback with Gemini AI and Google Sheets

### üåç **Overview**

This workflow automatically **extracts short emotional testimonials** from Google Form responses. It listens for new feedback in Google Sheets, processes it with AI (Google Gemini), writes back a refined testimonial, and sends an email notification.

Think of it as your **testimonial assistant**‚Äîturning raw customer feedback into marketing-ready quotes.

---

## üü¢ Section 1: Trigger ‚Äì Listen for New Feedback

üîó **Nodes:**

* **Google Sheets Trigger** ‚Üí Watches for new rows (new form responses).

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
Whenever a customer submits feedback via your form, this trigger **wakes up the workflow**.

üìà **Advantage:**
No manual checking ‚Äî feedback is instantly processed.

---

## üü¶ Section 2: Testimonial Extraction with AI

üîó **Nodes:**

* **Basic LLM Chain** ‚Üí Runs a custom prompt that tells the AI: *‚ÄúExtract a short, emotional testimonial quote from the feedback.‚Äù*
* **Google Gemini Chat Model** ‚Üí The AI brain that processes and rewrites the testimonial.

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
This part **filters out neutral or boring text** and produces a **catchy, emotional testimonial**.

üìà **Advantage:**
Saves you time editing feedback ‚Üí instantly produces marketing-ready quotes.

---

## üü£ Section 3: Store & Notify

üîó **Nodes:**

* **Google Sheets (Write Back)** ‚Üí Saves the extracted testimonial into the same Google Sheet.
* **Gmail** ‚Üí Sends an email with the new testimonial to your chosen inbox.

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
The testimonial is both **saved for records** and **shared with your team via email**.

üìà **Advantage:**
You get real-time alerts and maintain a growing database of testimonials.

---

* **Automates testimonial creation** ‚Üí No manual copywriting needed
* **Captures emotions** ‚Üí AI filters for impactful quotes
* **Centralized storage** ‚Üí All testimonials logged in Google Sheets
* **Instant notifications** ‚Üí New testimonials delivered straight to email
* **Beginner-friendly** ‚Üí Just connect your sheet + Gmail and it runs on its own
